label: 関東
本: Osaka: The Merchants' Capital of Early Modern Japan . Cornell University Press . 1999
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: (1)Eastern Japan from Shinano and Tōtōmi to Shimotsuke and Hitachi; (2)the seven provinces of Hitachi, Shimotsuke, Kōzuke, Musashi, Shimōsa, Kazusa, and Awa, to which Sagami is sometimes added to make the Kantō hasshū, the Eight Kantō Provinces. [信濃、遠江、下野、常陸、上野、武蔵、上総、安房、相模、関東八州]
